subject: Golf
Documentary Films and Programs
Motion Pictures
lead_paragraph: Less than a year after its climactic ending was filmed at the 2007 Women’s British Open, a documentary on Lorena Ochoa already has the feel of a period piece.
snippet: Less than a year after its climactic ending was filmed at the 2007 Women’s British Open, a documentary on Lorena Ochoa already has the feel of a period piece.
